message: Let's be fair, 60-40 is a good start
Your turn to be nice.  I'll take a slight majority this time.
I'll give you a bit more than last time, but I still think I deserve the bigger share
This is getting ridiculous. Take a tiny loss and let's be done with it.
I'm willing to compromise, but I still think I deserve the bigger share. Inflation is hurting both of us
This is my final offer.  50/50 or we both get nothing.  The money shrinks every round at this point.
